editionStmt.edition: Digital Edition in Wylie with TEI Markup

licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) licence applies to this document.

projectDesc.p: This document was created and is made available in the framework of the ERC project “The Dawn of Tibetan Buddhist Scholasticism (11th-13th c.) (TibSchol). This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement No. 101001002). See https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/101001002

prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

body.ab: lo tsha ba na re rtso pa'i skabs mngon du byas nas gzhung mdzes par 'gyur ba tsaM ngag 'di'i 'bras bu yin la | de yang rang bzhin kyi mdzes pa ngag 'di'i 'bras bur mi 'dod kyi bcos mas ba shes pa ngag gis 'bras bur 'dod pas gzhung 'buM pa la sogs pa rang bzhin gyi mdzes pa yod kyang dgos 'brel gyi ngag med pas bcos mas mdzes pa med do zhes zer pa yang ma yin te |

dang po ni lo tsha ba na re brjod bya bden pa yod par bstan pas bden rtogs kyi dgos pa med pa'i log rtogs khyegs la | de dgos pa bstan pas sgrub mi nus pa'i
log rtogs khyegs so zhes zer ba ni ma yin te | brjod bya bden pa yod par bstan pas de nyid med pa'i log rtogs khegs kyang de rtogs dgos pa med pa'i log rtogs mi khegs te | brjod bya bden pa yod pa la de rtogs pas ma khyab pa'i phyir shing yod par bstan pas sha pa med pa'i log rtogs mi khegs pa'i bzhin no || yang dgos pa bstan pas de nyid med pa'i log rtogs khegs kyang sgrub mi nus pa'i
log rtogs mi khyegs te | dgos pa yod pa la sgrub nus pas ma khyab pa'i phyir 'jog po'i nor bu bzhin no||

la sogs pa'i don du phung po lnga mi ston pa la rgyu mtshan ci yod zhe na || 'di la brang ti na re nyong pa thms cad kyi rgyu 'jig
tshogs la lta ba yin la des de nyes che bas de bzlog pa'i don du phung po lnga bstan zhes zer ba ni ma yin te |

ngo skal du che ba'i gang zag la bdag med par bsgoM pa zhes pa gzhan yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na | 'di la rog na re de ni nyon mong rnam sbyong °°° sa bon °°° spong pa'i gnyen po yin la | 'di ni spyod pa rnam sbyong de mngon 'gyur spong pa'i gnyen por bstan pa yin pas so zhes pa zhal 'tsham yang sa bdun pa Reading of the note tentative.de lta bu °°° dbye °°°°°° zhugs pa'i phyir dang | 'di °°°°°° brjod pas bdag 1 su med par °°°°°° bstan °°°°°° || yang gal te °°°°°° log rtogs mi skye pa'i phyir de bstan pa don med do zhe °° | 'di la 'phags pa rnaMs log rtogs skye ba'i phyis pa rnaMs skye bo zhes zhal °°° yang man chad du de skye par bshad de | byaMs pas
mtshan la rgyu dang phung po dang ||
khaMs dang skye mched dag dang ni ||
khaMs 3 pa la gnas dang chags zhes gsung pa'i phyir ro ||

mang du thos pa shag kya'i sras || lung rigs 'dzin pa gsad pa ring mo gyis || gnyes thang brag sna zhes bya bar || gzhan gyi don du brtson pas byar || || chos mngon po kun las btus pa'i rnams par bshad pa gsal ba blo'i rgyan zhes bya ba
There's possibly a lost portion of the line. chos dang gang zag po || || dag go | bkra shis par gyur gcig | he he |
